text: On this week's #CrimeScience ep, @hayes_cp @tomsitlogic & @tonycdonofrio discuss LPRC updates, false-flag operations, the #COVID19 #vaccine black market, civil unrest, the #Capitol, paid agitators, 2021 #technology trends & predictions, & more.
